author: dmarston
msg: Formalized version of Gary Peskin's apply-imprts test

author: garyp
msg: Fix bugzilla bug 1170.  If we're trying an xsl:apply-imports at the top level (ie there are no
imported stylesheets), we need to indicate that there is no matching template and prevent and infinite recursion by using the built-in template.
This testcase verifies that we do not recurse.

msg: Test the tests: simple API validation of LoggingHandler using JUnit as an experiment
